name: Street Fighter III: 3rd Strike Online Edition
summary: The PlayStation Network and Xbox Live Arcade port of Street Fighter III: 3rd Strike.

alternative_names.name: ストリートファイターⅢ サードストライク
Street Fighter III: Third Strike Online Edition

esrb.synopsis: This is an arcade-style fighting game in which players engage in one-on-one combat with a large cast of human and human-like characters. Players mostly punch, kick, and use special abilities (e.g., fireballs, flying moves, and energy blasts) to drain opponents' life meter. Characters grunt and cry out in pain during matches; special moves (multiple-hit combos) are highlighted by slow-motion effects as fighters are thrown to the ground. Some characters are depicted in skimpy or form-fitting costumes (e.g., thong-like underwear/bikinis) that accentuate their breasts and/or buttocks; a photo gallery also contains several images of fighters in provocative poses and revealing outfits (e.g., swimsuits, exaggerated cleavage).

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Violence in a sporting context
This game allows the player to interact with other players ONLINE
